scripts.start: tsc src/components/App.tsx src/components/Game.tsx src/components/Grid.tsx src/components/Tile.tsx --jsx react --esModuleInterop --watch --outdir compiledJS
scripts.test: watchify compiledJS/components/App.js compiledJS/components/Game.js compiledJS/components/Grid.js compiledJS/components/Tile.js -o devJS/bundle.js
scripts.build: browserify compiledJS/utils.js compiledJS/direction.js compiledJS/board.js compiledJS/ai.js compiledJS/components/App.js compiledJS/components/Game.js compiledJS/components/Grid.js compiledJS/components/Tile.js compiledJS/components/Tile.js compiledJS/components/Menu.js -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | terser --compress --mangle > productionJS/bundle.js
